params.welcome_message:
Welcome to my corner of the internet.

Whether you're here for the latest posts, looking for something specific, or just browsing around, I'm glad you stopped by.

You can find my recent writing in the [archives](/posts/). I'm also on [Mastodon](https://micro.blog/mtt), [Instagram](https://instagram.com/mattlangford), [X](https://x.com/mattlangford), and [Micro.blog](https://micro.blog/mtt). For work stuff, check out [Desk of Matt](https://deskofmatt.com).

Thanks for visiting.
